errors.error_description: Using conda commands to install packages in a Python virtual environment (venv) instead of pip, which causes incompatibility issues.
correction_candidates: Change conda install commands to pip install commands to match the virtual environment setup
Switch from venv to conda environment creation using conda create -n env python=3.8
Use pip install for all packages since venv is a pip-based environment manager
Create a conda environment first with conda create, then use conda install commands
errors.golden_answer: Change conda install commands to pip install commands to match the virtual environment setup
